name: Gone Astray GGJ21
description:
WASD to move

Hold arrow keys to shoot

SHIFT to Dash

This is a little game made by 3 people for Global Game Jam 2021. We have a random generated dungeon and various room to fight enemies and continue our journey. 

Arrow logo on bottom of the screen guides us to the boss of the game.

There are a lot of bugs and it crashes when you take a damage in WebGL build (I'll fix this soon). But you can download the executable and play without that problem.

Game Designer: Eren Darıcı

Gameplay Programmer: Ömer Akçalı & Eren Darıcı

Artist: Doruk Dinçer
